hadith.chapter: The Book of Pilgrimage - كتاب الحج
hadith.arabic-text: وحدثنا سعيد بن منصور، حدثنا سفيان، عن عبد الرحمن بن القاسم، عن أبيه، قال سمعت عائشة، تقول كنت أفتل قلائد هدى رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم بيدى هاتين ثم لا يعتزل شيئا ولا يتركه.
hadith.english-text: Abd al-Rahman b. al-Qasim reported on the authority of his father that he heard 'A'isha (Allah be pleased with her) saying: I used to weave garlands for the sacrificial animals of Allah's Messenger (may peace be upon him) with these hands of mine, but he (Allah's Apostle) neither avoided anything nor gave up anything (which a Muhrim should avoid or give up).
